title: Third-Party Plugins Store for the Lampa Online Cinema
description: Development of a third-party plugins store for the Lampa online cinema

info.client: Administrator of a Telegram group. This group publishes news about the Lampa cinema.

1.title: Architecture
1.text: The cinema has its own architecture that needed to be studied for use in the project.

2.title: Integration
2.text: In addition to the store's functionality while preserving the cinema's UI, news integration with a similar design and UI was required.

3.title: Blacklist
3.text: The code had to account for the cinema's specifics. The cinema constantly updates its blacklist of blocked plugins. If such a plugin is detected in the store, the store is also at risk.

dev.title: Development
dev.1: Implementation through the cinema's own functions.
dev.2: Standard rendering of the cinema's components to preserve the UI.
dev.3: Integration of project news through standard component rendering.
